### Government Tender: Smart Corporate Credit Cards and Travel Expense Reporting Solutions

***Reference:*** `cb-271-980556`
***Solicitation:** `RFI 23-24-500`
*Published on:* `2024-05-28`
*Closing Date:* `2024-06-28T17:00:00`
*Contract Start Date (Expected):* `2024-09-01`
*Contract End Date (Expected):* `2026-08-31`

***Project Overview:***
The National Arts Centre (NAC) is seeking information on smart corporate credit card solutions and integrated travel expense reporting systems available in Canada. Vendors are invited to provide their expertise through a Request for Information (RFI) process. The responses will be used to create a shortlist of qualified Vendors for a subsequent Request for Proposal (RFP).

***Key Details:***

* ***Category:*** SRV (Services)
* ***Method:*** Competitive, Open Bidding
* ***WTO:** `84141602` (Credit card service providers)
* ***Agreement:** Accords de Libre-Échange Canadien (CFTA)

***Pre-Requisites:***

* **Registration:** Interested Vendors must first register on the NAC's [Bonfire Hub](https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca) website.
* **Technical Support:** Please call [1-800-354-8010, ext. 2](tel:18003548010x2) or submit a request through the [NAC-Bonfire Hub portal](https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca/portal/support) for assistance with online registration, bid submissions, or other technical matters.

***Submission and Evaluation:**

*   Vendors are advised to carefully evaluate the provided documentation and to submit any questions regarding the RFI prior to the closing date.
*   The decision-making process and criteria for evaluation will be made known during the subsequent RFP process.
